sentences.en: A sudden abrupt motion , such as a yank or twist.
sentences.cn: 猛然向一侧扭拉的动作.

sentences.en: Always a hand at my collar ready yank me back.
sentences.cn: 总有一只手抓着我的衣领,预备把我猛拽回去.

sentences.en: Grabbing his ponytail, Shirley gave it a yank.
sentences.cn: 雪莉抓住他的马尾辫，猛地一拽。

sentences.en: He can yank on the rope as a signal.
sentences.cn: 他可以猛拉一下绳子作为信号.

sentences.en: He tried to yank his mind back out of fantasy.
sentences.cn: 他试图将思绪从想入非非的幻梦中拉回.

sentences.en: How do you know he won't wake up when you yank that thing out?
sentences.cn: 你敢保证当你拔出那东西的时候他不会醒?

sentences.en: Just a little twirl here and a yank there and – Voiolay!
sentences.cn: 你只要在这里稍微转动一下,再用力一拉,哇!

sentences.en: Please raise the box gently, not yank it up.
sentences.cn: 请把箱子轻轻地搬起来, 不要猛地一拽.

sentences.en: She gave the rope a yank.
The Brunette jumps and SWISH ! The firemen yank the blanket away.
sentences.cn: 褐发女往下一跳, 嗖,消防队员们突然把毯子拉跑了.

sentences.en: The dentist is going to yank this tooth out.
Which motivates me to yank my hand back.
sentences.cn: 这倒是真的“激励”到了我——我把手赶紧抽了回来.

sentences.en: Yank off the bandage the doctor uncovered the wound.
sentences.cn: 医生把绷带的开,让伤口露出来.

sentences.en: You can yank on the rope as a signal.
sentences.cn: 你可以猛拉一下绳子作为信号.

sentences.en: Younger teens then yank the rocks up with a pulley.
sentences.cn: 年龄稍小一点的用滑轮将岩石一筐一筐的拉出来.

trans.tran_en: to suddenly pull something quickly and with force
